dict.string: Explain why the app needs access to Bluetooth (Name: Privacy — Bluetooth Always Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs read and write access to the user's calendar data (Name: Privacy — Calendars Full Access Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs write-only access to the user's calendar data (Name: Privacy — Calendars Write Only Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs read and write access to the user's reminders data (Name: Privacy — Reminders Full Access Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the device's camera (Name: Privacy — Camera Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the device's microphone (Name: Privacy — Microphone Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's contacts (Name: Privacy — Contacts Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs to use Face ID (Name: Privacy — Face ID Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's desktop folder (Name: Privacy — Desktop Folder Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's documents folder (Name: Privacy — Documents Folder Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's downloads folder (Name: Privacy — Downloads Folder Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's network volumes (Name: Privacy — Network Volumes Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to files on removable volumes (Name: Privacy — Removable Volumes Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to files managed by a file provider (Name: Privacy — Access to a File Provider Domain Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's Game Center friend list
Explain why the app needs access to clinical health records (Name: Privacy — Health Records Usage Description)
Explain why the app requests permission to read samples from the HealthKit store (Name: Privacy — Health Share Usage Description)
Explain why the app requests permission to save samples to the HealthKit store (Name: Privacy — Health Update Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's HomeKit configuration data (Name: Privacy — HomeKit Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's location information (Name: Privacy — Location Always and When In Use Usage Description)
Explain why the app needs access to the user's location information (Name: Privacy — Location Usage Description)
Explain
